title: Montra Electric to unveil 2 new products; ramp up branch network: COO
description: TI Clean Mobility plans to introduce two new electric vehicles within months and expand its branch network. They aim to launch a cargo version of the e-Auto and an L3 e-rickshaw. The company targets over 150 dealerships in more than 150 cities by the fiscal year's end and increase monthly sales to 1,000 units.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
